Title: Directs the public service commission to develop and implement a plan making the sources of all energy generation in the state renewable sources by 2052
Summary: Directs the public service commission to develop and implement a plan making the sources of all energy generation in the state renewable sources by 2052.
LawCode: Amd ยง5, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to directing the public service commission to establish and implement a plan to make the state solely reliant on renewable sources of energy by January 1, 2052
